Sentencas: Modulation of the surface chemistry of air electrodes makes it possible to significantly improve the electrocatalytic performance of solid oxide cells (SOCs).
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Here, the surface chemistry of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-delta (BGLC) double perovskite is modulated by treatment in an acidic citric acid solution.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The treatment leads to corrosion on the surface of BGLC particles, and the effect is dependent on the acidity of the solution.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: As the acidity of solution is low, Ba cations are selectively dissolved out of the BGLC surface, while as the acidity increases, the corrosion becomes more homogeneous.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The Ba surface deficiency remarkably increases the concentration of surface oxygen vacancies and electrocatalytic activity of BGLC.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: To avoid the loss of Ba-deficient surface during the conventional high temperature sintering process, a sintering-free fabrication route is utilized to directly assemble the Ba-deficient BGLC powder into an air electrode.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: A single cell with the surface Ba-deficient BGLC electrode shows a peak power density of 1.04 W cm(-2) at 750 degrees C and an electrolysis current density of 1.48 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V, much greater than 0.64 W cm(-2) and 1.02 A cm(-2) of the cell with the pristine BGLC, respectively.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: This work provides a simple and effective surface chemistry modulation strategy for the development of an efficient air electrode for SOCs.
Titulo: Surface Chemistry Modulation of BaGd0.8La0.2Co2O6-δ As Active Air Electrode for Solid Oxide Cells
